channel.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win
channel.description:
![ToLBanner|690x249](upload://rSJfy1vKTD3sQsZUHdaWylVMKbu.png)
### Welcome to Forum of Lies 27 - hosted by @Arete, @Jane and @Amelia
## Rules Follow the https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244, and the https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926. Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up.
## Gameplay
* Days are 48 hours long or until an execution ends it, Nights last 24 hours. The first day is an exception, it lasts only 24 hours and has no execution. * You will be provided a DM with your classcard by the host, send your actions there. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used as they are found in this thread: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/vote [player]”. Please make the life of the hosts easier by bolding it (by putting ** ** around it) * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end. * When the day ends, the player with the most votes will be executed. * Voting "/no lynch" is an option. * You may self vote now.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
You find all possible night feedback here: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082
[details="Action order for Nerds"]
Night abilities will be processed in following order/priority: 1. Visit Prevention 2. Occupation 3. Targetted redirection 4. Non targetted redirection (like Tavernkeeper) 5. Killing 6. Protection 7. Miscellaneous Effects (like Bounty) 8. Investigation 1 (Faction checks, type checks, etc) 9. Conversion 10. Investigation 2 (Every kind of investigation which checks for abilities used *this* night)
In case there are conflicts on the same level (example: two Drunks try to redirect the same player), all these conflicting effects are canceled.
(thx Geyde) [/details]
## Journals
DM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. It has a character limit of 1000 characters.
## Classlist
**King** **(65% [color = steblue]Good[/color], 35% [color = purple]Evil[/color] / [color = scarlet]Devout[/color])** **[color = purple]Mastermind[/color]** / **[color = scarlet]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color = purple]Assassin[/color]** / **[color = scarlet]Random Cult[/color]** **[color = steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** / **[color = grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color = grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color = grey]Neutral Killer[/color]**
### You can find all classes here: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998
## Playerlist 1. ~~Luxy~~ ~~Gypyx~~ - **Died N2 - [color = SteBlue]The Good King[/color]** :crown: 2. ~~katze~~ - **Died N1 - [color = red]The Scorned[/color]** 3. ~~Chloe~~ - **Lynched D5 - [color = black]The Reaper[/color]** 4. ~~N.1~~ ~~folaccount~~ - **Died N2 - [color = SteBlue]The Sheriff[/color]** 5. ~~CRich~~ ~~SnakeEater32~~ - **Lynched D6 - [color = SteBlue]The Archer[/color]** 6. ~~Marshal~~ - **Died N3 - [color = SteBlue]The Tavernkeeper[/color]** 7. ~~SirDerpsAlot~~ - **Died N2 - [color = SteBlue]The Drunk[/color]** 8. Italy 9. ~~Vulgard~~ - **Lynched D9 - [color = SteBlue]The Court Wizard[/color]** 10. ~~PoisonedSquid~~ - **Lynched D3 - [color = purple]The Mastermind[/color]** 11. ~~Ami~~ - **Lynched D2 - [color = SteBlue]The Archer[/color]** 12. ~~Alice~~ - **Lynched D4 - [color = purple]The Mastermind[/color]** 13. Possessed 14. ~~Wazza~~ - **Died N3 - [color = SteBlue]The Hunter[/color]** 15. ~~Napoleon~~ Zone_Q11 16. ~~DryBones~~ - **Lynched D8 - [color = SteBlue]The Butler[/color]** 17. ~~EVO~~ ~~DatBird~~ - **Lynched D7 - [color = SteBlue]The Physician[/color]** 18. ~~Braixen~~ - **Lynched D2 - [color = SteBlue]The Hunter[/color]**
## Backups 1. DatBird
## Spectators Spectators are not informed, but they will have access to a thread where they can discuss the game state. 1. Anstreim 2. TheBlueElixir
### It's time again, isn't it? Let's have some fun together! The game will start at [date=2020-04-06 time=12:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"]. (In case there are mechanics changes until then, we are using the new mechanics of course. And no, the changes on April 1st were a joke and not official :P )
# Milestones: [Start of Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-forum-of-lies-27-day-1-18-18/81126/5?u=arete) [End of Day 1/Start of Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-forum-of-lies-27-day-1-18-18/81126/4118?u=arete) [Ami is lynched + bounty triggers](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-forum-of-lies-27-day-2-17-18-katze-is-katzegone/81126/9256) [End of Day 2/Braixen is lynched/Start of Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-forum-of-lies-27-night-2-15-18-bugged-arrow/81126/10465?u=amelia) [End of Day 3/PoisonedSquid is lynched/Start of Day 4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-forum-of-lies-27-night-3-11-18-squid-has-squidaddled/81126/13580?u=arete)

item.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win
item.dc:creator: Napoleon
item.description:
Zone_Q11:
Napoleon:

Argh I fucked up by not GTing when squid was gonna get lycnhee

Napoleon:

I panicked so that’s on me

Napoleon, your plan involved delaying at least 5 active out of 9 players, when exactly 5 of them are active on thread.

How the hell, especially with the argument “don’t quicklynch” that I don’t understand, am I supposed to delay that D4 mess?

I mean I didn’t expect it to work, but a miracle can always happen

Read full topic
item.source: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win

item.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win
item.dc:creator: Possessed
item.description:
That’s probably accurate lul (and obviously mostly wrong call outs)

Even still, why do we make statements and never re-reflect on them when we roll town? I feel like I do that a lot…never re-read my previous thoughts until endgame

Read full topic

item.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win
item.dc:creator: Possessed
item.description:
Possessed:

I feel like I’m pretty seasoned in scum logic. In the event this bleed is real, if there is ANY logic to this…

…it was an attempt to get the guaranteed kill. Alice says Luxy was bled early and before making reads, so the scum team are likely going to try and convert a towncored player tonight and have them slip in to become King. At that point they control the court and its GG.

Holy assfuck do you guys ever go back to your own reads in game and wonder why you don’t reflect back onto them?

This is D1, before Napoleon conversion.

Read full topic
item.source: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win

item.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win
item.dc:creator: CRichard564
item.description:
There is nothing wrong with emotions. Beware if you’re feeling any emotions that compromise your decision making. Don’t make big decisions if you’re feeling any emotion that impairs decision making skills.

Read full topic
item.source: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win

item.title: [FoL] Forum of Lies 27 - 10 day FoL (2/18) - Blue Dragon win
item.dc:creator: Possessed
item.description:
I did notice that and I think it dramatically improved your game. I think if you’re able to get away from the game for a bit, you can try and clear your head. I tried to do that a lot in JK9 too because I was getting pretty frustrated (obviously) and it just affects my entire game.

Read full topic
